title: nArAyaNa bArade
sahitya:
nArAyaNa bArade 


anupallavi

  bAri bArigI sharIravu bhAradhAge mADO nAmavu 
ghOrisida prahlAdana janakana urava sILida nAmavu


caraNam 1    dAridaryAdi bhayavondu illa dAri vaikuNThakke tOrOdalla 
nArAyaNa nimma nAma uccarisida nArada dEva rSiyAdanu
    caraNam 2    japa tapadali mADu mati japita mArgavidu kaThinavalla 
shrIpatiyenda draupadiya abhimAnava kAyida shrI nAmavu
    caraNam 3    mangaLa mUrutiye hingade bhakti rasadalli muLugide 
ranga purandara viTTla rAyana uraga shayananAda nAmavu
